00046 /* global pointer to QP object */
00047 static SQProblem* globalQP = 0;
00048 static SymmetricMatrix* globalQP_H = 0;
00049 static Matrix* globalQP_A = 0;
00050 sparse_int_t *globalQP_Hdiag = 0; 
00051 sparse_int_t *globalQP_Hir = 0; 
00052 sparse_int_t *globalQP_Hjc = 0; 
00053 sparse_int_t *globalQP_Air = 0; 
00054 sparse_int_t *globalQP_Ajc = 0;
00055 real_t *globalQP_Hv = 0;
00056 real_t *globalQP_Av = 0;
00057 
00058 
00059 /*
00060  *      a l l o c a t e G l o b a l Q P r o b l e m I n s t a n c e
00061  */
00062 void allocateGlobalQProblemInstance(    int nV, int nC, Options* options
00063                                                                                 )
00064 {
00065         globalQP = new SQProblem( nV,nC );
00066         globalQP->setOptions( *options );
00067 
00068         return;
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 /*
00073  *      d e l e t e G l o b a l Q P r o b l e m I n s t a n c e
00074  */
00075 void deleteGlobalQProblemInstance( )
00076 {
00077         if ( globalQP != 0 )
00078         {
00079                 delete globalQP;
00080                 globalQP = 0;
00081         }
00082 
00083         return;
00084 }

00087 /*
00088  *      d e l e t e G l o b a l Q P r o b l e m M a t r i c e s
00089  */
00090 void deleteGlobalQProblemMatrices( )
00091 {
00092         if ( globalQP_H != 0 )
00093         {
00094                 delete globalQP_H;
00095                 globalQP_H = 0;
00096         }
00097 
00098         if (globalQP_Hv)
00099         {
00100                 delete[] globalQP_Hv;
00101                 globalQP_Hv = 0;
00102         }
00103         
00104         if (globalQP_Hdiag)
00105         {
00106                 delete[] globalQP_Hdiag;
00107                 globalQP_Hdiag = 0;
00108         }
00109         
00110         if (globalQP_Hjc)
00111         {
00112                 delete[] globalQP_Hjc;
00113                 globalQP_Hjc = 0;
00114         }
00115         
00116         if (globalQP_Hir)
00117         {
00118                 delete[] globalQP_Hir;
00119                 globalQP_Hir = 0;
00120         }
00121         
00122         if ( globalQP_A != 0 )
00123         {
00124                 delete globalQP_A;
00125                 globalQP_A = 0;
00126         }
00127 
00128         if (globalQP_Av)
00129         {
00130                 delete[] globalQP_Av;
00131                 globalQP_Av = 0;
00132         }
00133         
00134         if (globalQP_Ajc)
00135         {
00136                 delete[] globalQP_Ajc;
00137                 globalQP_Ajc = 0;
00138         }
00139         
00140         if (globalQP_Air)
00141         {
00142                 delete[] globalQP_Air;
00143                 globalQP_Air = 0;
00144         }
00145 
00146         return;
00147 }

00150 /*
00151  *      i n i t
00152  */
00153 void init(      int nV, int nC,
00154                         SymmetricMatrix *H, real_t* g, Matrix *A,
00155                         const real_t* const lb, const real_t* const ub, const real_t* const lbA, const real_t* const ubA,
00156                         int nWSR, const real_t* const x0, Options* options,
00157                         int nOutputs, mxArray* plhs[]
00158                         )
00159 {
00160         /* 1) Setup initial QP. */
00161         allocateGlobalQProblemInstance( nV,nC,options );
00162 
00163         /* 2) Solve initial QP. */
00164         returnValue returnvalue;
00165 
00166         if ( x0 == 0 )
00167                 returnvalue = globalQP->init( H,g,A,lb,ub,lbA,ubA, nWSR,0 );
00168         else
00169                 returnvalue = globalQP->init( H,g,A,lb,ub,lbA,ubA, nWSR,0, x0,0,0,0 );
00170 
00171         /* 3) Assign lhs arguments. */
00172         obtainOutputs(  0,globalQP,returnvalue,nWSR,
00173                                         nOutputs,plhs,0,0 );
00174 
00175         return;
00176 }

00179 /*
00180  *      h o t s t a r t
00181  */
00182 void hotstart(  const real_t* const g,
00183                                 const real_t* const lb, const real_t* const ub,
00184                                 const real_t* const lbA, const real_t* const ubA,
00185                                 int nWSR, Options* options,
00186                                 int nOutputs, mxArray* plhs[]
00187                                 )
00188 {
00189         /* 1) Solve QP with given options. */
00190         globalQP->setOptions( *options );
00191         returnValue returnvalue = globalQP->hotstart( g,lb,ub,lbA,ubA, nWSR,0 );
00192 
00193         /* 2) Assign lhs arguments. */
00194         obtainOutputs(  0,globalQP,returnvalue,nWSR,
00195                                         nOutputs,plhs,0,0 );
00196 
00197         return;
00198 }
00199 
00200 
00201 /*
00202  *      h o t s t a r t V M
00203  */
00204 void hotstartVM(        SymmetricMatrix *H, real_t* g, Matrix *A,
00205                                         const real_t* const lb, const real_t* const ub, const real_t* const lbA, const real_t* const ubA,
00206                                         int nWSR, Options* options,
00207                                         int nOutputs, mxArray* plhs[]
00208                                         )
00209 {
00210         /* 1) Solve QP. */
00211         globalQP->setOptions( *options );
00212         returnValue returnvalue = globalQP->hotstart( H,g,A,lb,ub,lbA,ubA, nWSR,0 );
00213 
00214         if (returnvalue != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN)
00215                 mexErrMsgTxt("Hotstart failed.");
00216 
00217         /* 2) Assign lhs arguments. */
00218         obtainOutputs(  0,globalQP,returnvalue,nWSR,
00219                                         nOutputs,plhs,0,0 );
00220 
00221         return;
00222 }

00225 /*
00226  *      m e x F u n c t i o n
00227  */
00228 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[], int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[] )
00229 {
00230         unsigned int i,j;
00231 
00232         /* inputs */
00233         char typeString[2];
00234         real_t *H_for=0, *H_mem=0, *g=0, *A_for=0, *A_mem=0, *lb=0, *ub=0, *lbA=0, *ubA=0, *x0=0;
00235 
00236         Options options;
00237         options.printLevel = PL_LOW;
00238         #ifdef __DEBUG__
00239         options.printLevel = PL_HIGH;
00240         #endif
00241         #ifdef __SUPPRESSANYOUTPUT__
00242         options.printLevel = PL_NONE;
00243         #endif
00244 
00245         /* dimensions */
00246         unsigned int nV=0, nC=0;
00247 
00248 
00249         /* I) CONSISTENCY CHECKS: */
00250         /* 1) Ensure that qpOASES is called with a feasible number of input arguments. */
00251         if ( ( nrhs < 6 ) || ( nrhs > 10 ) )
00252                 if ( nrhs != 1 )
00253                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of input arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequence' for further information." );
00254 
00255         /* 2) Ensure that first input is a string ... */
00256         if ( mxIsChar( prhs[0] ) != 1 )
00257                 mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): First input argument must be a string!" );
00258 
00259         mxGetString( prhs[0], typeString, 2 );
00260 
00261         /*    ... and if so, check if it is an allowed one. */
00262         if ( ( strcmp( typeString,"i" ) != 0 ) && ( strcmp( typeString,"I" ) != 0 ) &&
00263                  ( strcmp( typeString,"h" ) != 0 ) && ( strcmp( typeString,"H" ) != 0 ) &&
00264                  ( strcmp( typeString,"m" ) != 0 ) && ( strcmp( typeString,"M" ) != 0 ) &&
00265                  ( strcmp( typeString,"e" ) != 0 ) && ( strcmp( typeString,"E" ) != 0 ) &&
00266                  ( strcmp( typeString,"c" ) != 0 ) && ( strcmp( typeString,"C" ) != 0 ) )
00267         {
00268                 mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Undefined first input argument!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequence' for further information." );
00269         }
00270 
00271 
00272         /* II) SELECT RESPECTIVE QPOASES FUNCTION CALL: */
00273         /* 1) Init (without or with initial guess for primal solution). */
00274         if ( ( strcmp( typeString,"i" ) == 0 ) || ( strcmp( typeString,"I" ) == 0 ) )
00275         {
00276                 /* consistency checks */
00277                 if ( ( nlhs < 1 ) || ( nlhs > 5 ) )
00278                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of output arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequence' for further information." );
00279 
00280                 if ( ( nrhs < 8 ) || ( nrhs > 10 ) )
00281                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of input arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequence' for further information." );
00282 
00283                 /* ensure that data is given in real_t precision */
00284                 if ( ( mxIsDouble( prhs[1] ) == 0 ) ||
00285                          ( mxIsDouble( prhs[2] ) == 0 ) ||
00286                          ( mxIsDouble( prhs[3] ) == 0 ) )
00287                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): All data has to be provided in real_t precision!" );
00288 
00289 
00290                 /* Check inputs dimensions and assign pointers to inputs. */
00291                 nV = mxGetM( prhs[1] ); /* row number of Hessian matrix */
00292                 nC = mxGetM( prhs[3] ); /* row number of constraint matrix */
00293 
00294                 if ( ( mxGetN( prhs[1] ) != nV ) || ( ( mxGetN( prhs[3] ) != 0 ) && ( mxGetN( prhs[3] ) != nV ) ) )
00295                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Input dimension mismatch!" );
00296 
00297 
00298                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &g,nV,1, BT_FALSE,prhs,2 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00299                         return;
00300 
00301                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &lb,nV,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,4 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00302                         return;
00303 
00304                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &ub,nV,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,5 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00305                         return;
00306 
00307                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &lbA,nC,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,6 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00308                         return;
00309 
00310                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &ubA,nC,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,7 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00311                         return;
00312 
00313                 /* default value for nWSR */
00314                 int nWSRin = 5*(nV+nC);
00315 
00316                 /* Check whether x0 and options are specified .*/
00317                 if ( nrhs > 8 )
00318                 {
00319                         if ( smartDimensionCheck( &x0,nV,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,8 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00320                                 return;
00321 
00322                         if ( nrhs > 9 )
00323                                 if ( ( !mxIsEmpty( prhs[9] ) ) && ( mxIsStruct( prhs[9] ) ) )
00324                                         setupOptions( &options,prhs[9],nWSRin );
00325                 }
00326 
00327                 deleteGlobalQProblemInstance( );
00328                 deleteGlobalQProblemMatrices( );
00329 
00330                 /* check for sparsity */
00331                 if ( mxIsSparse( prhs[1] ) != 0 )
00332                 {
00333                         mwIndex *oct_ir = mxGetIr(prhs[1]);
00334                         mwIndex *oct_jc = mxGetJc(prhs[1]);
00335                         double *v = (double*)mxGetPr(prhs[1]);
00336                         long nfill = 0;
00337                         long i, j;
00338 
00339                         /* copy indices to avoid 64/32-bit integer confusion */
00340                         /* also add explicit zeros on diagonal for regularization strategy */
00341                         /* copy values, too */
00342                         globalQP_Hir = new sparse_int_t[oct_jc[nV] + nV];
00343                         globalQP_Hjc = new sparse_int_t[nV+1];
00344                         globalQP_Hv = new real_t[oct_jc[nV] + nV];
00345                         for (j = 0; j < nV; j++) 
00346                         {
00347                                 globalQP_Hjc[j] = oct_jc[j] + nfill;
00348                                 /* fill up to diagonal */
00349                                 for (i = oct_jc[j]; i < oct_jc[j+1] && oct_ir[i] <= j; i++) 
00350                                 {
00351                                         globalQP_Hir[i + nfill] = oct_ir[i];
00352                                         globalQP_Hv[i + nfill] = v[i];
00353                                 }
00354                                 /* possibly add zero diagonal element */
00355                                 if (i >= oct_jc[j+1] || oct_ir[i] > j)
00356                                 {
00357                                         globalQP_Hir[i + nfill] = j;
00358                                         globalQP_Hv[i + nfill] = 0.0;
00359                                         nfill++;
00360                                 }
00361                                 /* fill up to diagonal */
00362                                 for (; i < oct_jc[j+1]; i++) 
00363                                 {
00364                                         globalQP_Hir[i + nfill] = oct_ir[i];
00365                                         globalQP_Hv[i + nfill] = v[i];
00366                                 }
00367                         }
00368                         globalQP_Hjc[nV] = oct_jc[nV] + nfill;
00369 
00370                         SymSparseMat *sH;
00371                         globalQP_H = sH = new SymSparseMat(nV, nV, globalQP_Hir, globalQP_Hjc, globalQP_Hv);
00372                         globalQP_Hdiag = sH->createDiagInfo();
00373                 }
00374                 else
00375                 {
00376                         H_for = (real_t*) mxGetPr( prhs[1] );
00377                         H_mem = new real_t[nV*nV];
00378                         for( uint i=0; i<nV*nV; ++i )
00379                                 H_mem[i] = H_for[i];
00380                         globalQP_H = new SymDenseMat( nV, nV, nV, H_mem );
00381                         globalQP_H->doFreeMemory();
00382                 }
00383 
00384                 /* Convert constraint matrix A from FORTRAN to C style
00385                  * (not necessary for H as it should be symmetric!). */
00386                 if ( nC > 0 )
00387                 {
00388                         /* Check for sparsity. */
00389                         if ( mxIsSparse( prhs[3] ) != 0 )
00390                         {
00391                                 mwIndex *oct_ir = mxGetIr(prhs[3]);
00392                                 mwIndex *oct_jc = mxGetJc(prhs[3]);
00393                                 double *v = (double*)mxGetPr(prhs[3]);
00394 
00395                                 /* copy indices to avoid 64/32-bit integer confusion */
00396                                 globalQP_Air = new sparse_int_t[oct_jc[nV]];
00397                                 globalQP_Ajc = new sparse_int_t[nV+1];
00398                                 for (long i = 0; i < oct_jc[nV]; i++) globalQP_Air[i] = oct_ir[i];
00399                                 for (long i = 0; i < nV + 1; i++) globalQP_Ajc[i] = oct_jc[i];
00400 
00401                                 /* copy values, too */
00402                                 globalQP_Av = new real_t[globalQP_Ajc[nV]];
00403                                 for (long i = 0; i < globalQP_Ajc[nV]; i++) globalQP_Av[i] = v[i];
00404 
00405                                 globalQP_A = new SparseMatrix(nC, nV, globalQP_Air, globalQP_Ajc, globalQP_Av);
00406                         }
00407                         else
00408                         {
00409                                 /* Convert constraint matrix A from FORTRAN to C style
00410                                 * (not necessary for H as it should be symmetric!). */
00411                                 A_for = (real_t*) mxGetPr( prhs[3] );
00412                                 A_mem = new real_t[nC*nV];
00413                                 convertFortranToC( A_for,nV,nC, A_mem );
00414                                 globalQP_A = new DenseMatrix(nC, nV, nV, A_mem );
00415                                 globalQP_A->doFreeMemory();
00416                         }
00417                 }
00418 
00419                 /* Create output vectors and assign pointers to them. */
00420                 allocateOutputs( nlhs,plhs, nV,nC );
00421 
00422                 /* Call qpOASES. */
00423                 init(   nV,nC,
00424                                 globalQP_H,g,globalQP_A,
00425                                 lb,ub,lbA,ubA,
00426                                 nWSRin,x0,&options,
00427                                 nlhs,plhs
00428                                 );
00429 
00430                 return;
00431         }
00432 
00433         /* 2) Hotstart. */
00434         if ( ( strcmp( typeString,"h" ) == 0 ) || ( strcmp( typeString,"H" ) == 0 ) )
00435         {
00436                 /* consistency checks */
00437                 if ( ( nlhs < 1 ) || ( nlhs > 5 ) )
00438                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of output arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequence' for further information." );
00439 
00440                 if ( ( nrhs < 6 ) || ( nrhs > 7 ) )
00441                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of input arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequence' for further information." );
00442 
00443                 /* has QP been initialised? */
00444                 if ( globalQP == 0 )
00445                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): QP sequence needs to be initialised first!" );
00446 
00447 
00448                 /* Check inputs dimensions and assign pointers to inputs. */
00449                 nV = globalQP->getNV( );
00450                 nC = globalQP->getNC( );
00451 
00452                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &g,nV,1, BT_FALSE,prhs,1 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00453                         return;
00454 
00455                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &lb,nV,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,2 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00456                         return;
00457 
00458                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &ub,nV,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,3 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00459                         return;
00460 
00461                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &lbA,nC,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,4 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00462                         return;
00463 
00464                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &ubA,nC,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,5 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00465                         return;
00466 
00467                 /* default value for nWSR */
00468                 int nWSRin = 5*(nV+nC);
00469 
00470                 /* Check whether options are specified .*/
00471                 if ( nrhs == 7 )
00472                         if ( ( !mxIsEmpty( prhs[6] ) ) && ( mxIsStruct( prhs[6] ) ) )
00473                                 setupOptions( &options,prhs[6],nWSRin );
00474 
00475                 /* Create output vectors and assign pointers to them. */
00476                 allocateOutputs( nlhs,plhs, nV,nC );
00477 
00478                 /* call qpOASES */
00479                 hotstart(       g,
00480                                         lb,ub,lbA,ubA,
00481                                         nWSRin,&options,
00482                                         nlhs,plhs
00483                                         );
00484 
00485                 return;
00486         }
00487 
00488         /* 3) Cleanup. */
00489         if ( ( strcmp( typeString,"c" ) == 0 ) || ( strcmp( typeString,"C" ) == 0 ) )
00490         {
00491                 /* consistency checks */
00492                 if ( nlhs != 0 )
00493                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of output arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequence' for further information." );
00494 
00495                 if ( nrhs != 1 )
00496                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of input arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequence' for further information." );
00497 
00498                 /* Cleanup global SQProblem instance. */
00499                 deleteGlobalQProblemInstance( );
00500                 deleteGlobalQProblemMatrices( );
00501                 
00502                 return;
00503         }
00504 
00505         /* 4) Solve current equality constrained QP. */
00506         if ( ( strcmp( typeString,"e" ) == 0 ) || ( strcmp( typeString,"E" ) == 0 ) )
00507         {
00508                 /* consistency checks */
00509                 if (nlhs != 1 && nlhs != 2)
00510                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of output arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequence' for further information." );
00511 
00512                 if (nrhs != 6 && nrhs != 7)
00513                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of input arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequence' for further information." );
00514 
00515                 /* has QP been initialised? */
00516                 if ( globalQP == 0 )
00517                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): QP sequence needs to be initialised first!" );
00518 
00519 
00520                 /* Check inputs dimensions and assign pointers to inputs. */
00521                 int nrhs = mxGetN(prhs[1]);
00522                 nV = globalQP->getNV( );
00523                 nC = globalQP->getNC( );
00524                 real_t *x_out, *y_out;
00525 
00526                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &g,nV,nrhs, BT_FALSE,prhs,1 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00527                         return;
00528 
00529                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &lb,nV,nrhs, BT_TRUE,prhs,2 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00530                         return;
00531 
00532                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &ub,nV,nrhs, BT_TRUE,prhs,3 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00533                         return;
00534 
00535                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &lbA,nC,nrhs, BT_TRUE,prhs,4 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00536                         return;
00537 
00538                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &ubA,nC,nrhs, BT_TRUE,prhs,5 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00539                         return;
00540 
00541                 /* Check whether options are specified .*/
00542                 if ( (  nrhs == 7 ) && ( !mxIsEmpty( prhs[6] ) ) && ( mxIsStruct( prhs[6] ) ) )
00543                 {
00544                         int nWSRin = 5*(nV+nC);
00545                         setupOptions( &options,prhs[6],nWSRin );
00546                         globalQP->setOptions( options );
00547                 }
00548 
00549                 /* Create output vectors and assign pointers to them. */
00550                 plhs[0] = mxCreateDoubleMatrix( nV, nrhs, mxREAL );
00551                 x_out = mxGetPr(plhs[0]);
00552                 if (nlhs == 2)
00553                 {
00554                         plhs[1] = mxCreateDoubleMatrix( nV + nC, nrhs, mxREAL );
00555                         y_out = mxGetPr(plhs[1]);
00556                 }
00557                 else
00558                         y_out = new real_t[nV+nC];
00559 
00560                 /* Solve equality constrained QP */
00561                 returnValue returnvalue = globalQP->solveCurrentEQP( nrhs,g,lb,ub,lbA,ubA, x_out,y_out );
00562 
00563                 if (nlhs < 2)
00564                         delete[] y_out;
00565 
00566                 if (returnvalue != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN)
00567                 {
00568                         char msg[200];
00569                         msg[199] = 0;
00570                         snprintf(msg, 199, "ERROR (qpOASES): Couldn't solve current EQP (code %d)!", returnvalue);
00571                         mexErrMsgTxt(msg);
00572                 }
00573 
00574                 return;
00575         }
00576 
00577         /* 5) Modify matrices. */
00578         if ( ( strcmp( typeString,"m" ) == 0 ) || ( strcmp( typeString,"M" ) == 0 ) )
00579         {
00580                 /* consistency checks */
00581                 if ( ( nlhs < 1 ) || ( nlhs > 5 ) )
00582                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of output arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequenceVM' for further information." );
00583 
00584                 if ( ( nrhs < 8 ) || ( nrhs > 10 ) )
00585                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of input arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequenceVM' for further information." );
00586 
00587                 /* ensure that data is given in real_t precision */
00588                 if ( ( mxIsDouble( prhs[1] ) == 0 ) ||
00589                          ( mxIsDouble( prhs[2] ) == 0 ) ||
00590                          ( mxIsDouble( prhs[3] ) == 0 ) )
00591                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): All data has to be provided in real_t precision!" );
00592 
00593                 /* Check inputs dimensions and assign pointers to inputs. */
00594                 nV = mxGetM( prhs[1] ); /* row number of Hessian matrix */
00595                 nC = mxGetM( prhs[3] ); /* row number of constraint matrix */
00596 
00597                 if ( ( mxGetN( prhs[1] ) != nV ) || ( ( mxGetN( prhs[3] ) != 0 ) && ( mxGetN( prhs[3] ) != nV ) ) )
00598                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Input dimension mismatch!" );
00599 
00600                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &g,nV,1, BT_FALSE,prhs,2 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00601                         return;
00602 
00603                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &lb,nV,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,4 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00604                         return;
00605 
00606                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &ub,nV,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,5 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00607                         return;
00608 
00609                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &lbA,nC,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,6 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00610                         return;
00611 
00612                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &ubA,nC,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,7 ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00613                         return;
00614 
00615                 /* default value for nWSR */
00616                 int nWSRin = 5*(nV+nC); 
00617 
00618                 /* Check whether x0 and options are specified .*/
00619                 if ( nrhs > 9 )
00620                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of input arguments!\nType 'help qpOASES_sequenceVM' for further information." );
00621 
00622                 if ( nrhs > 8 )
00623                         if ( ( !mxIsEmpty( prhs[8] ) ) && ( mxIsStruct( prhs[8] ) ) )
00624                                 setupOptions( &options,prhs[8],nWSRin );
00625 
00626                 deleteGlobalQProblemMatrices( );
00627 
00628                 /* check for sparsity */
00629                 if ( mxIsSparse( prhs[1] ) != 0 )
00630                 {
00631                         mwIndex *oct_ir = mxGetIr(prhs[1]);
00632                         mwIndex *oct_jc = mxGetJc(prhs[1]);
00633                         double *v = (double*)mxGetPr(prhs[1]);
00634                         long nfill = 0;
00635                         long i, j;
00636 
00637                         /* copy indices to avoid 64/32-bit integer confusion */
00638                         /* also add explicit zeros on diagonal for regularization strategy */
00639                         /* copy values, too */
00640                         globalQP_Hir = new sparse_int_t[oct_jc[nV] + nV];
00641                         globalQP_Hjc = new sparse_int_t[nV+1];
00642                         globalQP_Hv = new real_t[oct_jc[nV] + nV];
00643                         for (j = 0; j < nV; j++) 
00644                         {
00645                                 globalQP_Hjc[j] = oct_jc[j] + nfill;
00646                                 /* fill up to diagonal */
00647                                 for (i = oct_jc[j]; i < oct_jc[j+1] && oct_ir[i] <= j; i++) 
00648                                 {
00649                                         globalQP_Hir[i + nfill] = oct_ir[i];
00650                                         globalQP_Hv[i + nfill] = v[i];
00651                                 }
00652                                 /* possibly add zero diagonal element */
00653                                 if (i >= oct_jc[j+1] || oct_ir[i] > j)
00654                                 {
00655                                         globalQP_Hir[i + nfill] = j;
00656                                         globalQP_Hv[i + nfill] = 0.0;
00657                                         nfill++;
00658                                 }
00659                                 /* fill up to diagonal */
00660                                 for (; i < oct_jc[j+1]; i++) 
00661                                 {
00662                                         globalQP_Hir[i + nfill] = oct_ir[i];
00663                                         globalQP_Hv[i + nfill] = v[i];
00664                                 }
00665                         }
00666                         globalQP_Hjc[nV] = oct_jc[nV] + nfill;
00667 
00668                         SymSparseMat *sH;
00669                         globalQP_H = sH = new SymSparseMat(nV, nV, globalQP_Hir, globalQP_Hjc, globalQP_Hv);
00670                         globalQP_Hdiag = sH->createDiagInfo();
00671                 }
00672                 else
00673                 {
00674                         H_for = (real_t*) mxGetPr( prhs[1] );
00675                         H_mem = new real_t[nV*nV];
00676                         for( uint i=0; i<nV*nV; ++i )
00677                                 H_mem[i] = H_for[i];
00678                         globalQP_H = new SymDenseMat( nV, nV, nV, H_mem );
00679                         globalQP_H->doFreeMemory();
00680                 }
00681 
00682                 /* Convert constraint matrix A from FORTRAN to C style
00683                  * (not necessary for H as it should be symmetric!). */
00684                 if ( nC > 0 )
00685                 {
00686                         /* Check for sparsity. */
00687                         if ( mxIsSparse( prhs[3] ) != 0 )
00688                         {
00689                                 mwIndex *oct_ir = mxGetIr(prhs[3]);
00690                                 mwIndex *oct_jc = mxGetJc(prhs[3]);
00691                                 double *v = (double*)mxGetPr(prhs[3]);
00692 
00693                                 /* copy indices to avoid 64/32-bit integer confusion */
00694                                 globalQP_Air = new sparse_int_t[oct_jc[nV]];
00695                                 globalQP_Ajc = new sparse_int_t[nV+1];
00696                                 for (long i = 0; i < oct_jc[nV]; i++) globalQP_Air[i] = oct_ir[i];
00697                                 for (long i = 0; i < nV + 1; i++) globalQP_Ajc[i] = oct_jc[i];
00698 
00699                                 /* copy values, too */
00700                                 globalQP_Av = new real_t[globalQP_Ajc[nV]];
00701                                 for (long i = 0; i < globalQP_Ajc[nV]; i++) globalQP_Av[i] = v[i];
00702 
00703                                 globalQP_A = new SparseMatrix(nC, nV, globalQP_Air, globalQP_Ajc, globalQP_Av);
00704                         }
00705                         else
00706                         {
00707                                 /* Convert constraint matrix A from FORTRAN to C style
00708                                 * (not necessary for H as it should be symmetric!). */
00709                                 A_for = (real_t*) mxGetPr( prhs[3] );
00710                                 A_mem = new real_t[nC*nV];
00711                                 convertFortranToC( A_for,nV,nC, A_mem );
00712                                 globalQP_A = new DenseMatrix(nC, nV, nV, A_mem );
00713                                 globalQP_A->doFreeMemory();
00714                         }
00715                 }
00716 
00717                 /* Create output vectors and assign pointers to them. */
00718                 allocateOutputs( nlhs,plhs, nV,nC );
00719 
00720                 /* Call qpOASES */
00721                 if ( globalQP == 0 )
00722                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): QP needs to be initialised first!" );
00723 
00724                 if ( ( (int)nV != globalQP->getNV( ) ) || ( (int)nC != globalQP->getNC( ) ) )
00725                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): QP dimensions must be constant during a sequence!" );
00726 
00727                 hotstartVM(     globalQP_H,g,globalQP_A,
00728                                         lb,ub,lbA,ubA,
00729                                         nWSRin,&options,
00730                                         nlhs,plhs
00731                                         );
00732 
00733                 return;
00734         }
00735 }
00736

00738  *      end of file
00739  */
